sections.text: A derivative proceeding may be brought in the Superior Court by:
A member or members having 5% or more of the voting power, or by 50 members, whichever is less; or
Any director or member of a designated body.

The plaintiff in a derivative proceeding shall be a member, director, or member of a designated body at the time of bringing the proceeding. A plaintiff that is a member shall also have been a member at the time of any action complained of in the derivative proceeding.
